arts.ttl: Neymar 'is travelling to his first Santos training sessions via HELICOPTER'... with Brazil superstar currently 'commuting 500km from his Rio de Janeiro mansion' after January move
arts.sum: Neymar has reportedly arrived by a custom helicopter at the first training session of his boyhood club Santos, only days after his emotional return to Brazil.

arts.ttl: Santos want 'Neymar project' to last until 2026 WC
arts.sum: Santos president Marcelo Teixeira is confident Neymar will remain at the club at least until the 2026 World Cup.

arts.ttl: Neymar Jr Wears Old-Gen Blackout Puma Future Ultimate Boots - Hinting He's Leaving Puma?
arts.sum: Returning to his old club, Santos, Neymar surprisingly wore old-gen blackout Puma Ultimate boots instead of the current generation Puma Future 8 boots.

arts.ttl: Neymar’s new look for Santos return
arts.sum: After 12 years away, Neymar has returned to Brazil to sign for his boyhood team, Santos . “I’m happy that everyone is saying that it’s a rescue of Brazilian soccer, I’m happy for the affection, not just from the Santos fans, but from fans of other teams, who cheer for me.

arts.ttl: West Ham miss out on €40m striker compared to Neymar
arts.sum: Lorient are said to be comfortable with this position as they believe that Kroupi will be worth €60-72m come the summer transfer market – an enormous price for the club considering L’Equipe was quoting a potential €10m deal to Bournemouth at the weekend. While West Ham were able to match Lorient’s expectations in terms of the transfer fee, they were unable to provide terms to the deal that were given the green light by the Breton side, who are well placed to head back to Ligue 1 after relegation last season.
